casename: Hatton National Bank Ltd v Ocean Gourmet Pte Ltd
counsel: Lee Wei Yung and K Subramaniam (Khattar Wong & Partners) for the defendants/appellants; Samuel Chacko (Colin Ng & Partners) for the plaintiffs/respondents
tags-parsed: Bills of Exchange and Other Negotiable Instruments/Requirements of form/Bill of exchange payable at a future time/Bill accepted by drawee in exchange for release of title documents to goods/Whether bill of exchange valid/Whether drawee estopped from denying validity of accepted bills of exchange/ss 3 & 11 Bills of Exchange Act (Cap 23)
